extendedInfo.description: Best App for learning Chinese!  Speaking essential Chinese words and phrases with Li, experiencing high quality authentic audio and easy to follow Chinese Character and Pinyin.  Learning a language is experiencing a new culture and opening up a new world.  Li is thrilled to show you around!What's the difference? This App uses real clear voice recorded by Li, a native Chinese speaker who is passionate about Chinese language and culture.  Many other Apps use text to speech robot voice, it is fast and the pronunciation is a little bit off, hard to follow.Start from entry level, no previous experience needed. Learn Chinese with Li fits for everyone.  Good for learning Chinese as well as travel in China.  Talking Mandarin Chinese becomes fun and easy!  It is like you hired your own private tutor and made a Chinese native friend.This demo version contains a limited set of words and phrases. To get the complete set with hundreds of more awesome Chinese words and phrases, update to Learn Chinese with Li (Pro) which offers essential Chinese conversational skills, including greetings and introductions, questions and answers, dinning out, travel and shopping, talking about your interests and hobbies, telling time, counting numbers and much more.  Features:-Chinese Character, Pinyin and English translation in nice   large fonts. Clear and easy to follow.-High quality clear audio from Li, a native Chinese speaker, the App designer and coder.-Touch screen to listen to audio and see translation.-Character by character translation.-Audio flashcard format.-No internet connection needed-Daily pop up reminder can be turned on in settings.Category covered in free version:-Greetings-People-General Conversation-Eat & DrinkPro version covers the following categories in addition and more phrases in the free categories:-Hobbies-Travel & Directions-Love & Relationship-Shopping-Places-Numbers-Time & Day-Colors-Animal & Pets-General essential words-Animals and petsLi was born and grew up in great Beijing area in China, attended top engineering university in China.  She is passionate about travel, languages and culture. She used to be a part time Chinese teacher, now she is an Engineer. Li designed, coded this App and recorded the audio. Yes, what you hear is her voice.  Her English speaking friends often asked her for language and travel tips before visiting China, such as how to say Hello, Yes, Dinner, Cheers, Beer etc in Chinese, which inspires her to publish this App.  Li loves travel and experiencing world cultures and languages.China has a booming economy and great growth potential. China has five thousands of years splendid civilization. More and more people are learning Chinese. Download this App before you heading to Beijing, Shanghai, Xian, Shenzhen, Taiwan or Hong Kong, or going to meet Chinese friends. Download this App if you are learning Chinese. This App fit for everyone.  It is the best App for learning Mandarin Chinese!Rosetta Stone cost hundreds of dollars to start. This App is better than Rosetta Stone in a lots of ways and it is free. The Pro version just cost of a cup of coffee and can get you  on par with one year college level Chinese course which cost  a couple of hundreds.Feedback:If you like Learn Chinese with Li app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating on Google Play. For comments and suggestions please send an email to cloudspeedapps@gmail.com  We love getting feedback from you.Li post her travel pictures and blogs in both Chinese and English on twitter and Google plus.  Make learning Chinese more social and fun!Join Google Plus Learn Chinese Community:https://plus.google.com/b/117312967435846408888/communities/114086323099834306817Follow Li on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/LearnChineseWithLiFollow Li on twitter: @LearnChineseLiFollow Li on Google+ page: http://gplus.to/LearnChinese

reviews.comment: Awesome, ni hoa moa which means how are you , love this app it has so much to teach. 5star. Thank you ( xie xie) developers  you are so kind to offer so much for so little adds.
reviews.author: obinna akunne

reviews.title: No customization.
reviews.comment: Can\'t toggle traditional symbols. Volume isn\'t maximized - some sounds are loud and some are quite. Quiz mode doesn\'t support hiding Chinese instead of English. Can\'t change how many times the sounds are repeated - you\'re forced to hear it 3 times with a pause even after English. You can only play 1 category at a time and words always come in same sequence. Considering these things, Pro version is really overpriced.
reviews.author: Alex R

reviews.title: Simplied Version Only
reviews.comment: App would be much better if it had a setting to let you switch to traditional version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app it\'s so much fun.
reviews.author: Juliann Martinez

reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Makarand Tilloo

reviews.title: love the App
reviews.comment: I just started using this app and I am able to speak to my friends in Mandarin. Li is very clear with her pronunciations. I dont ever pay for apps but I had to buy this one so I can learn more. she makes is easy ans Yi Er San (1,2,3)  Thanks Li
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Don\'t use the app enough, and with my underpowered phone, this app slows things down by unnecessarily automatically booting when the phone starts and runs in the background when I don\'t need it.
reviews.author: Lee Dar

reviews.title: Very great educational app. for everyone.
reviews.comment: This is a good program, clear speech in Chinese & English, it has the symbols, pinyin meanings & English text too.  You can even test yourself before tapping the screen for the answer.  The text is clear to read, the background graphics add emphasis and look really nice. The developers are fast to reply emails, sort bugs and updates.  So I rate this program 5 stars. I hope you like it too. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Many phrases, high Quality clear audio, big fonts, easy to follow.  I used a couple of Apps, this is my favorite.  My Chinese friends are impressed how much I have learn in a short time
